long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you find fascinating stories, recipes, tweets, tutorials, or get links from friends but have no time to read them, use Linkship to save them for later.

#1 Save anything, read anywhere

Your saved links get added to a personalized RSS feed, this way you can read saved links in your favorite news feed reader.

#2 Links you can't miss, distraction-free

Articles saved to your feed are free of ads and privacy-invasive trackers. Tweets, YouTube videos and content from many other social websites included.

#3 RSS

Linkship doesn't come with a standalone reader app, you're welcome to use your existing RSS news readers to enjoy your saved articles. Linkship helps you get your reading stack in check.
